traits.name: Improved Critical
traits.desc: Gore attacks score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20.

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.desc: The woolly rhinoceros has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

traits.name: Charge
traits.desc: If the woolly rhinoceros moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 9 (2d8) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the woolly rhinoceros can make one stomp attack against it as a bonus action.

actions.name: Gore
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) piercing damage.

actions.name: Stomp
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 18 (2d12 + 5) piercing damage.
